content.body: Hi, all. üëã This is only my second time attending TC39, and the first time was over four years ago.  Since we're less than 24 hours from the start, I'm trying to get a feel for what to expect, along the lines of "when will the draft schedule be posted?", and "how can I test my configuration to make sure I'm ready to present with no technical glitches?"
